content.0: Focallocal is an open, welcoming community of thousands of positive people around the world.
content.1: Since 2011 we have been coming together and targeting the root causes of any, and all societal issues.
content.2: Sharing ideas, and using fun activities to empower people to build a friendlier, happier more connected future for everyone.
content.3: Join us and turn Positive Action into a daily habit to explore your power to change the world, and the happiness it'll bring into your life

items.friends: make ‘positive’ friends all over the world

content.0: You'll be a part of a growing global Movement with a plan to change the world
content.1: Meeting positive, pro-active, awesome new friends both locally, and globally
content.2: Together using simple, fun activities and exploring new ideas to shape friendlier, happier communities
content.3: Bringing peace and well-being to everyone, everywhere

2.title: What is our mission and message?

content.0: Times are changing, and so can our feeling of powerless at the pain we see every day around us, and on the news
content.1: Today's technology gives us ALL have the power to solve ALL of the world's problems ourselves, by coming together and using positive and innovative tools to target their roots causes
content.2: While each action may feel like a tiny ripple. As the Positve Action Movement sweeps around the world these ripples will combine into an unstoppable wave of positive change!
content.3: Focallocal is about empowering people. The time for waiting for others to fix this planet is over
content.4: That future is ours, if we all just do a little Positive Action, every day!

3.title: Focallocal is all about taking action

section_titles.3: 4. How can someone find the resource
section_titles.4: 5. Offering a Resource? How will people recognise you? (otherwise just click next)

sub.3: Be as specific as possible. Next to a statue? North, West of a bridge? Not sure? Check Google Earth
sub.4: Carrying a Teddy Bear on your Shoulder? Wearing a bright yellow hat? wearing a Focallocal badge or T-shirt?

subs.0: 'Choose category' enter a resource you've found
subs.2: 'Offer a resource' to offer something to support people nearby who are homeless
subs.1: 'Suggestions' see ideas for what you can offer

text.0: Simply click the buttons above and copy/paste the info below.
text.2: Join the Global Movement, become a Positive Action Hero and take action for Positive Change where you live right now, at www.focallocal.org
